This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0102 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
D Message received, stored for later processingMessage received, stored for later processing
F acknowledgment after processingacknowledgment after processing

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
DNachricht erhalten, zur Bearbeitung gespeichert
FBestätigung nach Verarbeitung (veraltet)

name: DelayedAcknowledgmentType
title: delayedAcknowledgmentType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify a response type used in deferred processing two phase reply for delayed acknowldgement mode of the original acknowledgement mechanism defined in HL7 Version 2.x messaging and used in the MSH segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0102 (Delayed acknowledgment type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Message received, stored for later processing
concept.definition: Message received, stored for later processing
